creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
description: Long strip of linen embroidered in rather coarse brick stitch with six tree-shaped medallions outlined in green and yellow, enclosing and surrounded by floral motifs, in blue, tan, brown and deep red - the latter the predominating color. Soiled tan linen lining, pieced once. Thick silk fringe at one end.
title: Panel
